name: Ganyu
title: "Plenilune Gaze" Ganyu
desc: "This press release is due tomorrow... I suppose I could work through the night and get it done."

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Ganyu to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Trail of the Qilin
skills.desc: Deals 1 <span style="color:#99FFFFFF">Cryo DMG, creates 1 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Ice Lotus.

skills.name: Frostflake Arrow
skills.desc: Deals 2 <span style="color:#99FFFFFF">Cryo DMG, deals 2 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby.

skills.name: Celestial Shower
skills.desc: Deals 2 <span style="color:#99FFFFFF">Cryo DMG, deals 1 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby, summons 1 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Sacred Cryo Pearl.
